name: BlastMatrix
description:
This is a small prototype built to experiment with multiplayer, player customization, and generally putting together a whole tiny game application.  

Includes lobbies, text chat, explosions, terrible music, and a plethora of bugs! 

Most main features should work, but things can be a little bit buggy. 

Definitely a fun project to learn from while building, but FAR from polished. 

Really, just a prototype to learn a few specific things. Originally developed in 2020.
